tmpdir = '.matchzoo_test_save_load_tmpdir'
if Path(tmpdir).exists():
    shutil.rmtree(tmpdir)
try:
    model.save(tmpdir)
    assert mz.load_model(tmpdir)
    with pytest.raises(FileExistsError):
        model.save(tmpdir)
finally:
    if Path(tmpdir).exists():
        shutil.rmtree(tmpdir)
pytest.mark.cron
